item.description:
This is a hands-on workshop to learn how to make your own incenses, oils, sprays, and bath salts.

There will be a short lecture on the "how to's" with working with all of these modalities, and a short lesson on correspondences, and how to find what herbs and oils will bring about the magickal energies you desire for protection, purification, healing, money, love, health and more.

Each participant will then make their own ritual bath salts, aura cleansing spray, altar incense, and consecration oil to take home.

The class will be from 7:00- 10:00 pm in Gardner, Mass,
The total cost will be $35.00-
$15.00 for the class + $15.00 for the materials+ $5.00 for the bound class booklet.

It will be helpful if participants have a mortar and pestle, however this is not necessary to take class.

These can be bought for $10 at Marshalls in the home goods dept- Please note it is best to get a marble one, or a stone one :)

Your RSVP: Yes Change RSVP 1 attending

9 spots available

item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street and come in the front door! :)
item.name: Oils, Incense & Brews Class
